movies.title: El juego más divertido
movies.plot: Ada and Bruno are TV "stars", specialized in soap operas with love scenes. In their private life the couple has also a secret affair which can't come to anything due to the popularity of both of them, and their being surveyed from every place. What they do for the cameras is something impossible for them behind them.
movies.simplePlot: Ada and Bruno are TV "stars", specialized in soap operas with love scenes. In their private life the couple has also a secret affair which can't come to anything due to the popularity of ...

biography.bio: This Spanish actress started studying dancing. Her teacher encouraged her to participate in her first film Obsession (1977). After that, she was chosen by the director Narciso Ibáñez Serrador to be one of the co-hostesses of the famous TV contest Un, dos, tres... responda otra vez (1972) becoming very well known all over Spain. Since 1975 she also made several films in France and Italy. In Spain, she had her first success with Girl with the Golden Panties (1980), directed by Vicente Aranda. She has won twice the Best Actress Award at the San Sebastial Film Festival for El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987) and for Personne ne parlera de nous quand nous serons mortes (1995). In 1991 she won the Silver Bear at Berlin Film Festival for her work in Lovers: A True Story (1991).
biography.name: Victoria Abril

biography.bio: Antonio Valero was born on August 24, 1955 in Burjassot, València, Comunitat Valenciana, Spain as Antonio Valero Osma. He is an actor, known for Love in Difficult Times (2005), El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987) and The Color of the Clouds (1997).
biography.name: Antonio Valero

biography.bio: Maribel Verdú was born on October 2, 1970 in Madrid, Spain as María Isabel Verdú Rollán. She is an actress, known for Snow White (2012), Pan's Labyrinth (2006) and Y Tu Mamá También (2001). She is the older sister of twins Marina and Carlota and she has been married to Pedro Larrañaga since September 1999.
biography.name: Maribel Verdú

biography.bio: Antonio Resines was born on August 7, 1954 in Torrelavega, Cantabria, Spain as Antonio Fernández Resines. He is an actor and producer, known for La famille Serrano (2003), Cellule 211 (2009) and A las once en casa (1998). He was previously married to Marisol de Mateo.
biography.name: Antonio Resines

biography.placeOfBirth: Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain
biography.bio: Santiago Ramos was born on August 1, 1949 in Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain as Santiago Ramos Sánchez. He is an actor, known for Aquí no hay quien viva (2003), El Lobo (2004) and Como un relámpago (1996). He has been married to Paca Almenara since August 2005.
biography.name: Santiago Ramos

biography.bio: Miguel Rellán was born on November 7, 1943 in Tetuan, Morocco as Miguel Ángel Rellán García. He is an actor, known for Revolución (2002), Menudo es mi padre (1996) and Compañeros (1998).
biography.name: Miguel Rellán

biography.bio: Ricard Borràs is an actor, known for Makinavaja (1995), Lovers: A True Story (1991) and A Body in the Woods (1996).
biography.name: Ricard Borràs

biography.bio: El Gran Wyoming was born on May 14, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as José Miguel Monzón Navarro. He is an actor and director, known for Caiga quien caiga (1996), El intermedio (2006) and El club de la comedia (1999).
biography.name: El Gran Wyoming

biography.bio: Born in Extremadura, lived in Córdoba 2 years until he moves to Madrid, in order to study political sciences. While attending university, decided to enroll at the EOC, an acting school. He debuted in cinema with a minor role in the film, Rosa de Lima (1961). After an initial stage in which he played loose papers with a predominance of villains, from the 1980s, that begins to appear on more ambitious and controversial films, ascending to a position of first order within the Spanish acting landscape.
biography.name: Manuel de Blas

biography.placeOfBirth: A Coruña, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain
biography.bio: Nancho Novo was born on September 17, 1958 in A Coruña, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain as Venancio Manuel Jesús Novo Cifuentes. He is an actor, known for Lovers of the Arctic Circle (1998), The Red Squirrel (1993) and Astronauts (2003).
biography.name: Nancho Novo

biography.bio: Juan de Pablos was born on February 19, 1948 in Cáceres, Cáceres, Extremadura, Spain as Juan de Pablos López. He is an actor, known for Year of Enlightment (1986), Going Down in Morocco (1989) and El vuelo de la paloma (1989).
biography.name: Juan de Pablos

biography.bio: Diana Peñalver was born in 1965 in Spain. She is an actress, known for Dead Alive (1992), El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987) and Canción de cuna (1994).
biography.name: Diana Peñalver

biography.bio: Manuel Zarzo was born on April 26, 1932 in Madrid, Spain as Manuel López Zarza. He is an actor and assistant director, known for El súper (1996), La verdad de Laura (2002) and El Lobo (2004).
biography.name: Manuel Zarzo

biography.bio: María José del Valle is an actress, known for El auténtico Rodrigo Leal (2005), La vida alegre (1987) and The Year of Maria (2000).
biography.name: María José del Valle

biography.bio: Manuela Velasco is a Spanish TV hostess and actress. Velasco is best known for starred in the Spanish horror films REC (2007), REC 2 (2009), REC 4: Apocalypse (2014), and the Spanish television series Velvet. She make her film debut in Pedro Almodovar's Law of Desire (1987). In 2007, she won the Goya Award for Best New Actress for her performance in REC.
biography.name: Manuela Velasco

categories.category: Best Movie Actress (Mejor Actriz de Cine)
